info.title: LN Markets API
info.description:
Trade derivatives on the **[Lightning Network](https://lightning.network/)**.
You can find our website **[here](https://lnmarkets.com/)**.

tags.name: Login
tags.description: Here you can find the different way to auth yourself on LN Markets, mostly use for browser.

tags.name: LNURL
tags.description:
Interaction with the lightning network using the [LNURL procotocol](https://github.com/btcontract/lnurl-rfc/)
LNURL enable simple auth, withdraw and pay UX / UI.

apiKeyAuth.description:
Api key auth is using `LNM-ACCESS-KEY` `LNM-ACCESS-PASSPHRASE` `LNM-ACCESS-TIMESTAMP` `LNM-ACCESS-SIGN` headers
(Only one header is shown below because our docs engine does not allow to put more there)
See (here)[https://docs.lnmarkets.com/api/v1/#section/REST-API/Authentication]
apiKeyAuth.name: LNM-ACCESS-KEY

post.description:
Send the order form parameters to add a new position in database.
**If `type="l"`, the property `price` must be included in the request to know when the position should be filled.**
**You can choose to use the margin or the quantity as a parameter, the other will be calculated with the one you chose**

get.description:
Verify the public key with the signature and the k1 to create a account or connect into a existing account.
If token is set to true, a token will be returned
Else the connected state will be push over websockets the client

parameters.description: LNURL type.

parameters.name: k1
parameters.description: Hex encoded 32 bytes of challenge which is going to be signed by user private key.

parameters.name: sig
parameters.description: Signature generated by the lightning wallet.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Public key of the lightning wallet.

parameters.name: hmac
parameters.description: HMAC signature used to secure LNURL.

parameters.name: jwt
parameters.description: Request will respond with a token

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Request will respond with a token

parameters.name: referral
parameters.description: Is the account created with an referral

post.description:
LNURL string used to create an account or connect to a existing account.
The user wallet will sign a message using the provided k1 inside the LNURL.
You need to have a session cookie on the browser you are using to log in.
